---
pagetitle: "Danilo Toapanta - Projects"
listing:
    - id: projects
      template: listing-projects.ejs
      page-size: 25
      contents: /
      sort: "date desc"
      type: grid
      image-height: 150px
      fields: [image, title, categories]
      #field-display-names:
        #date: " "
        #title: "Title "
      categories: false 
      grid-columns: 3
      #sort-ui: false
      #filter-ui: true
      #date-format: YYYY-MM-D
sidebar: false
# page-layout: full
page-layout: article
css: index.css
include-after-body: show-all-projects.html
# filters:
#    - lightbox
---
